attributes.action: Lets get all fireworks banned from public Sale
attributes.additional_details: We want to see the banning of all fireworks to the public! Children, animals and adults alike are petrified of them but have no reprieve from now till well into New Year. Each year the fatalities are frightening because mindless, irresponsible idiots are able to purchase them with out question. Fireworks should be banned for public sale and used only at organised and licensed events only!!! As is the case in almost all other Countries!!! You wouldn't let your child or animal play with electrical equipment why should fireworks be any different....lets make a difference to the safety and wellbeing of our communities
